LanguageData.PlantBlazebulb.label: Blazebulb
LanguageData.PlantBlazebulb.description: Genetically engineered plant designed to yield pyrophoric compounds for use in incendiary weapons.\n\nGreat care must be taken in cultivating these as the incendiary compounds inside the bulbs can self-ignite at temperatures above 28°C/82F, requiring constant cooling to maintain optimal growth temperatures.
